data.text: @ewnupdates Yeah and? The whole world doesn't come to an end just because you were in isolation. Life goes on with or without you.
@ewnupdates So I guess, if he were not in isolation he would have prevented the unrest. The bugger does not understand it is not about him.

@ewnupdates As a mother of two kids I have battled alot with my financial state to the point of begging from friends just to survive,until I started Bitcoin trading with the help of @_AMBREYMARCUS1 I made a successful withdrawal of R 200,000 with the help of @_ambreymarcus1.
@ewnupdates So what was he gonna do if he was not in isolation. Lame excuses
